mutants.original_line: """Converts a string to lowercase, removes punctuation marks and digits, and preserves whitespace characters."""
return ''.join(filter(lambda x: not x.isdigit(), s.lower().translate(str.maketrans("", "", string.punctuation))))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join(filter(lambda x: not x.isdigit(), s.lower().translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(filter(lambda x: not x.isdigit(), s.lower().translate(str.maketrans("", "", string.punctuation))))
return ''.join(filter(lambda x: not x.isdigit(), s.lower().translate(str.maketrans("", "", string.punctuation))))
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(filter(lambda x: not x.isdigit(), s.lower().translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))))
